ai-patthana16.43:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.43:0.3_0: Instead, he based on the past.
ai-patthana16.43:1.1_0: Because of the past, future, or present. Because of the thought that doesn’t arise because of the past.
ai-patthana16.43:2.1_0: Nor do you take pleasure in the past, future, or present.
